alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Kearny (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 1:03PM CDT until June 15 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Hamilton County in southwestern Kansas... Northwestern Kearny County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 145 PM CDT/1245 PM MDT/. * At 103 PM CDT/1203 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Syracuse, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kendall around 115 PM CDT. Syracuse around 1215 PM MDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
